response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which we believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,500,000 to you, and we are eager to facilitate this transaction. We would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,350,000. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1350000}
